channel.title: Fail GodSword stances! Help with regular 2h stance?

item.title: Fail GodSword stances! Help with regular 2h stance?
item.dc:creator: @sjustin1996 sjustin1996
item.description:
@sjustin1996 wrote:

if (item2handed(wearID) == true) { playerSE = 0x811; playerSEW = 0x67F; playerSER = 0x680; }

TESTED: I modified the 2 handed stances to be playerSEA = 1665; and found that I fixed my custom weapon, although my godswords are not as of just yet.

Read full topic
item.source: Fail GodSword stances! Help with regular 2h stance?
